drivers package

Subpackages

Submodules

drivers.rob_in_hood module

class drivers.rob_in_hood.RobInHood(conf_path='conf/json/rih_robot_motion_positions.json', ip='172.16.0.2', sim=True, vel=0.05)[source]

Bases: object

This class connects with Panda robot.

camera_to_rack(rack_number=1)[source]

Takes a photo of a given rack. :param rack_number: The rack number is a integer which range go from 1 to 3.

camera_to_rack_photos_on_the_way()[source]

Takes photos of the three racks.

check_quantos_cartridge()[source]

Terminates the program if the robot fails to mount the cartridge in order to avoid the quantos station to close the front when the robot is on the way.

check_quantos_door_position()[source]

Terminates the program when the door is closed, aiming to avoid the robot to collide against the mettler.

devices_connected_report()[source]

Terminates the program if one of the devices is not available.

go_home()[source]

This method moves the robot to its home position in the Hood.

WARNING: Since the robot is located in a constrained space, calling this method from a position where the robot is away from the home position may lead to potential crashes. :return: None

init_camera()[source]

Returns True when connected to a camera and False otherwise.

init_ika(default_speed=500)[source]

Returns True when IKA has been connected, False otherwise.

init_pump()[source]

Returns True when connected to the xCalibur pum, False otherwise.

init_quantos()[source]

Returns True when connected to quantos, False otherwise.

init_robot()[source]

This method stablishes connection with Panda robot when self.sim is set to True. TODO It is neccesary to work on the sim mode, which is currently not working. :return: True when the robot is connected, False when the robot connection fails and True hen the sim mode (self.sim) is set to True :type: bool

insert_cartridge_in_quantos(cartridge_number=1)[source]

Inserts the cartridge into quantos. Terminates the program if the quantos front door is closed in order to avoid any collisions.

pick_and_place_cartridge_in_holder(cartridge_number=1)[source]

Picks a cartrige from the quantos station and places it into its holder. :param cartridge_number: and integer between 1 and 3 wchis represent the number of the cartridge.

pick_and_place_cartridge_in_quantos(cartridge_number=1)[source]

Picks and places a given cartridge into the quantos station. Terminates program if the cartridge was not mounted. :param cartridge_number: and integer between 1 and 3 wchis represent the number of the cartridge.

pick_up_cartridge_from_holder(cartridge_number=1)[source]

Picks the cartridge from its holder. Terminates the program if the quantos front door is closed in order to avoid any collisions.

pull_pump()[source]

Pulls the vial holder of the pump.

pump_inyect(input_source='I3', output='I3', quantity=5000, repeat=1)[source]

Inyects a given quantity and repeats the cicle the times given by repeat :param input_source: I3, I4, …, I12 :param output: I1 to vial and I2 goes to the left overs vial. :param quantity: 3000 = 1 ml 40000 =1 ml for microstepping … :param repeat: This is the number of times the shringe repeats a cicle (fills, inyects).

push_pump()[source]

Pushes the vial holder of the pump.

quantos_dosing(quantity=0)[source]

Closes front and side doors and doses a given quantity. When finishes dosing, it opens the doors.

remove_cartridge_from_quantos(cartridge_number=1)[source]

Removes the cartridge from quantos. It terminates the program if the front door of quantos is closed in order to avoid potential collisions.

return_cartridge_to_holder(cartridge_number=1)[source]

Returns the cartridge to its holder TODO To recognise automatically which cartridge was taken..

vial_ika_to_pump(ika_slot_number=1)[source]

Moves a vial from the IKA station to the vial holder of the pump. :param ika_slot_number: an integer which possible values go from 1 to 12

vial_ika_to_quantos(ika_slot_number=1)[source]

Moves a vial from the IKA station to the quantos station. Terminates if the front door of the quantos station is closed in order to avoid potential collisions. :param ika_slot_number: an integer which possible values go from 1 to 12

vial_ika_to_rack(ika_slot_number=1, vial_number=1)[source]

Moves a vial from the ika station to the rack. :param vial_number: an integer which possible values go from 1 to 22 :param ika_slot_number: an integer which possible values go from 1 to 12

vial_pump_to_ika(ika_slot_number=1)[source]

Moves a vial from the vial holder of the pump to a given IKA slot. :param ika_slot_number: an integer which possible values go from 1 to 12

vial_pump_to_quantos()[source]

Moves a vial from the vial holder of the pump to the Quantos mettler station. Terminates the program if the front door of the quantos station is closed to avoid potential collisions.

vial_pump_to_rack(vial_number=1, from_home=False)[source]

Moves a vial from the vial holder of the pump to the rack. :param vial_number: an integer which possible values go from 1 to 22 :param from_home: bool when set to True, the robot executes this method from its home position. When is set to False, the robot executes its movements from a position close to the pump.

vial_quantos_to_ika(ika_slot_number=1)[source]

Moves a vial from the quantos station to the IKA station. :param ika_slot_number: an integer which possible values go from 1 to 12

vial_quantos_to_pump()[source]

Moves a vial from the quantos station to the vial holder of the pump. Terminates if the front door of the quantos station is closed in order to avoid potential collisions.

vial_quantos_to_rack(vial_number=1)[source]

Moves a vial from the quantos station to the rack. Terminates if the front door of the quantos station is closed in order to avoid potential collisions. :param vial_number: an integer which possible values go from 1 to 22

vial_rack_to_ika(vial_number=1, ika_slot_number=1)[source]

Moves a vial from the rack to the IKA station. :param vial_number: an integer which possible values go from 1 to 22 :param ika_slot_number: an integer which possible values go from 1 to 12

vial_rack_to_pump(vial_number=1)[source]

Moves a vial from the rack to the pump. :param vial_number: an integer which possible values go from 1 to 22

vial_rack_to_quantos(vial_number=1)[source]

Moves a vial from the rack to the quantos mettler. Terminates the program if the front door of the quantos station is closed. :param vial_number: an integer which possible values go from 1 to 22.

drivers.camera module

class drivers.camera.Camera(camera_id=0)[source]

Bases: object

This class connects with a camera and streams video while running in a thread. :param camera_id: integer

camera_stream()[source]

Streams the images from the camera.

init_camera()[source]

Connects to a camera :returns: Returns True when the connection was succesful, False otherwise. :type: bool

save_picture(name, path='imgs/')[source]

Saves a picture from the camera with a given name and arandomly generated id. :param name: name of the picture :type string: :param path: path where the image is going to be saved :type string:

start_streaming()[source]

Starts the thread that runs the video streaming.

stop_streaming()[source]

Stops the thread running the video streaming.

drivers.timer module

class drivers.timer.Timer(display_updates_timer=60)[source]

Bases: object

This class can be used to generate long time pauses.

Parameters:

display_timer – is an integer controls how long it takes to display updates, given in seconds, of the elapsed time

display_current_time()[source]

Prints updates of the elapsed time since the timer was started.

set_timer(hours=0, min=0, sec=0)[source]

Transforms the given hours, minutes and seconds into seconds. :param hours: integer :param min: integer :param sec: integer

start_timer()[source]

Starts a thread that allows displaying the elapsed time while producing a delay.
